tool_description: This is a simple API for IMDb top 100 movies
title: IMDb top 100 movies

api_list.name: Get Top 100 Movies according to IMDb
api_list.description: Get Top 100 Movies according to IMDb
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-top-100-movies1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-top-100-movies1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get a specific  Movie  by id
api_list.description:
get top x movie by id 'top46' :
The Cover image, Rank, Title, Thumbnail, Rating, Id, Year, Images, Description, Genre, Director, Writer and IMDb ID .
